name: 施欣文
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule: The course schedule will be announced at the beginning of class, but we will be working through units 7–12 in American Headway 5, along with supplemental readings. In past classes, we have read either a few short stories, a play, or a classic children's novel. Students occasionally make English presentations or participate in skits. Students have opportunities to practice their speaking English and improve their oral and written grammatical skills through speaking and writing activities. Quizzes and tests are given periodically as incentives to learn particular vocabulary and grammar.
scorePolicy:
Homework: 25%
Quizzes/Tests: 25%
Skits and Oral Activities: 10%
Presentations: 10%
Midterm: 20%
Participation: 10%
materials:
American Headway 5
Online readings and other materials
